description.description: Short description of the material in 2 - 3 sentences.

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier for the material.

creationDate.description: Creation date of the material in the format YYYYMMDDTHHMMSSZ.

copyright.description: Copyright information with year and company.

license.description: License information. For common open source licenses, provide an SPDX identifier. For other types of licenses, provide an URL to a webpage with the license or the filename of a separately provided license file.

author.description: Name or email address of the author of this material. In case of multiple authors, use comma-separation. The author can also be a company name.

brdf.description: General information about the lookup table.

typicalSensor.description: Typical sensor technology this BRDF table is used for, e.g., radar, lidar, camera.

wavelengthRange.description: Wavelength range covered by the lookup table. The first item is the minimum wavelength in meters and the second item is the maximum wavelength in meters.

lookupTable.description: Array of bidirectional reflectance distribution function (BRDF) values. The array SHALL be sorted based on the columns starting with the first.

items.description: Incident elevation angle (= zenith angle) relative to the surface normal in rad.
Exit elevation angle (= zenith angle) relative to the surface normal in rad.
Exit azimuth angle in rad. For BRDFs with incident and exit vectors on the same plane as the normal, exit azimuth angle is 0.
